page.title: 06Shopping in Pendlebury
page.content: In{Pendlebury}we have lots of {shops}and a{market.}The market is open three times a week and my mum goes there to buy lots of food. I go with her on Saturdays to carry the shopping. When you go in it smells of {fish and cabbage.}I don't like that so I hurry past those stalls. Where the {barbecued chickens}are cooking it smells lovely and makes my mouth water. Most people shop in the market because it is very cheap. You can buy any type of{food, clothes, sports {clothes, toys and material.}I asked people if they did all their shopping in the market. Most people said that they went to the{supermarket}to buy {bread, frozen food}and special food like{pizzas}and{herbs.
